mapper.select: SELECT member_id, name, sex, tier, exemption_coupon, created_timestamp FROM members WHERE status = 1
SELECT member_id, name, sex, tier, exemption_coupon, created_timestamp FROM members WHERE status = 1 AND name = #{name}
SELECT member_id, name, access_level FROM members WHERE status = 1 AND token = #{token}
SELECT member_id, name, access_level, token FROM members WHERE status = 1 AND enc_verify_number = #{verifyNumber}
SELECT name, sex, tier, exemption_coupon, created_timestamp, access_level FROM members WHERE status = 1 AND kakao_session_id = #{kakaoSessionId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (name, sex, last_chgr_manager) VALUES (#{name}, #{sex}, #{lastChgrManager})
mapper.update:
UPDATE members
tier = #{tier},
exemption_coupon = #{exemptionCoupon},
status = #{status},
enc_verify_number = #{encVerifyNumber},
token = #{token}, enc_verify_number = null,
last_chgr_manager = #{lastChgrManager},
updated_timestamp = NOW()
WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
AND status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tier_chg_hst (name, tier_bf, tier_af, reason, last_chgr_manager) VALUES (#{name}, #{tier_bf}, #{tier_af}, #{reason}, #{lastChgrManager})
INSERT INTO exemption_coupon_hst (name, amount, reason, last_chgr_manager) VALUES (#{name}, #{amount}, #{reason}, #{lastChgrManager})
